[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting we ol i tok orait long en em ol tingting bilong Aristotle long sains (science), wantaim saikoloji (psychology).
English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
Tok Pisin: Long ol nupela de bilong em, dispela 'show' i save kamap long redio bilong intanet TogiNet Radio, dispela em i wanpela websait we i save gat ol toktok bilong redio long en.
English: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'binary number' em i ken i gat tupela velu (value), dispela em i 0 o 1, na ol dispela namba em ol i save kolim olsem ol 'binary digit' - o 'bits' long toktok bilong komputa.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Tok Pisin: 'Great Pyramid' long Giza em i wanpela bilong ol 'seven wonders' we i sanap yet long tude.

label: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.
predictions: "Yumi nau i gat mous em i gat 4 mun pasin, na em i no gat diabetes, tasol em i bin gat diabetes," em i tok.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
Tok Pisin: Dispela woa em bai i stap 40-pela yia na pait i kamap tru tru, long ol ami (army) we i makim ol kantri, long ol ples bilong pait long Africa i go long Asia, long Afghanistan, Cuba na planti narapela ples.
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stap kol moa long ol ples we i raunim ol long san na long nait ol i hot moa long ol ples we i raunim ol.
English: Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol samting i gat wanwan eria bilong stadi bilong ol yet, na i lukluk long ol rot bilong givim ol ansa long ol problem we i save kamap long olgeta de.
English: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol risets i kamap long 'Twentieth century' i bin soim olsem i gat tupela 'pool' bilong 'genetic variation': wanpela em i hait na wanpela em i stap ples klia.
English: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
Tok Pisin: Taim yumi skelim olgeta samting, yumi mas no ken kirap nogut sapos ol tumbuna bilong ol i stretim ol "problem bilong 'protein'" bilong ol long wankain we olsem ol 'chimps' long 'savanna' i save mekim long tude.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dr. Ehud Ur, em i wanpela profesa bilong marasin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, long Nova Scotia na em i siaman sains na klinik seksen bilong Canadian Diabetes Association i givim tok lukaut olsem dispela risets i nupela yet.
predictions: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor bilong medisin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, Nova Scotia na taim i stap long wanpela olgeta divisen bilong klinikal na scientific bilong Canadian Diabetes Association i tokaut long dispela risets i stap long taim bilong em i nogat kamap yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Long ol Springboks, em i pinis bilong 5-pela gem we ol i lus i kam inap nau.
English: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela 'feral' pikinini em ol lain i tok olsem ol animal long bus i lukautim ol; sampela em ol lain i tok olsem ol i stap ol yet long bus.
English: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sport' we planti manmeri i save long en em 'football', 'basketball', 'volleyball', 'water-polo', 'fencing', 'rugby', 'cycling', 'ice hockey', 'roller hockey' na 'F1 motor racing'.
English: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
Tok Pisin: Em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela samting we i save pulim ol turis i go long South Africa na ol i save lukim em olsem impoten samting insait long South African National Parks (SANParks).

label: Wankain olsem ol narapela saveman, em i gat tupela tingting sapos ol i ken oraitim sik suga, em i tok olsem ol dispela samting we ol i painimaut long en, em i no bilong ol manmeri husat i gat Type 1 bilong sik suga.
predictions: Olsem ol narapela 'expert', em i no beliv long olsem diabetes i save kisim karem, em i tok olsem dispela tingting i no gat wanem samting long ol lain we oli gat diabetes Taim 1.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
Tok Pisin: Long ol ples we i hot long Middle East, haus em i no impoten.
English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
Tok Pisin: Sapos kantri we yu bai go long en em ol lain i tok save long sampela samting we yu mas lukaut long en, sampela senis bai kamap long 'travel health insurance' o 'trip cancellation insurance' bilong yu.

Tok Pisin: Bipo, i no olgeta Sámi i bin stap insait long wok bilong lukautim planti lain 'reindeer', tasol ol i stap long painim pis, painim abus na kain olsem, planti bilong ol i save gat 'reindeer' bilong karim kago.
English: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'German pastry' em ol i gutpela tru, na long Bavaria, ol i gat gutpela teist na i gat kainkain, wankain olsem ol dispela bilong ol lain i stap saut, ol Austria.

label: Long Mande, nambawan sekreteri bilong Nobel Commitee for Literature long Swedish Academy, i tokaut long pablik long redio progrem bilong Sveriges Radio long Sweden olsem, ol i bin no inap long toktok wantaim Bob Dylan long 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature we em bin winim, na ol i no wok long traim long toktok wantaim em.
predictions: Long Mande, Sara Danius, permanent sekretari bilong Nobel Komiti bilong Literetia long Swedish Academy, i mekim wanpela pablik anons long wanpela raideo program long Sveriges Radio long Sweden, tok olsem komiti, i no ken kamapim kontakt wantaim Bob Dylan long stret long winim Nobel Prize bilong 2016 long Literetia, i stopim olgeta wok bilong en long kamapim kontakt wantaim em.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.

English: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
Tok Pisin: Polis i tok ol i saspek olsem wanpela soldia bilong Daesh (ISIL) i kamapim dispela hevi.
English: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
Tok Pisin: Ol atoriti i ting olsem dispela i soim olsem ol dispela kontena we i holim 'uranium' long dispela senta i mas bruk na i wok long lik (leak).
English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, lukaut long ol smel we i save pulim ol bea na ol narapela animal, olsem na no ken karim o kukim kaikai we i gat strongpela smel na mekim kem i stap klin.
English: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu ringim sampela lain we i stap tausen 'mile' longwe, yu wok long yusim wanpela 'satellite'.

Tok Pisin: Ol Wagonways em ol i bin bildim long England taim bipo long '16th Century'.

Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wokabaut long tupela lek em ol i painim long fosil (fossil) bilong ol Australopithecus we i bin stap 4.2-3.9 milien yia i go pinis, tasol ol Sahelanthropus i bin wokabaut long tupela lek long kain taim olsem seven milien yia i go pinis.

English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol pikinini em ol i save kolim ol olsem "'feral" o wel pikinini. Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.
English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
Tok Pisin: NextGen em i wanpela sistem we FAA i tok olsem em bai larim ol balus long flai long ol sotpela rot na seivim (save) planti milien galen (gallon) bilong 'fuel' long olgeta yia na daunim mak bilong 'carbon' we i save go long 'air'.
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Tok Pisin: Wankain, taim yu gat wanpela Schengen visa, yu no nid long aplai long ol visa long wanwan bilong ol Schengen memba kantri, na dispela seivim taim, mani na pepawok.
English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim i go pinis long dispela wik, wanpela helikopta (helicopter) i 'crash' na i kilim tripela lain na narapela tripela i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong ol.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti manmeri i stap laip yet husat i bin stap long dispela taim, na planti lain moa husat i gat ol lain we ol laikim i bin dai o ol i bin wok go na dai long hap, ol Jew na ol lain i no Jew wantaim.
English: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save long mak bilong spit i stap daunbilo moa long ol narapela seksen — planti taim em i 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — na pasin bilong bihainim ol gut em i moa impoten long sakim tok.
English: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
Tok Pisin: Ol i painimaut olsem Sun i save ol wankain bikpela tingting olsem ol narapela sta: Dispela ektiviti bilong olgeta sta long sistem em ol i painimaut olsem 'luminosity' na 'rotation' bilong ol i save mekim ol i tanim tanim, na i no gat narapela samting gen.
English: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
Tok Pisin: Apia em ol i bin kamapim em long 1850s na em i bin nambawan kapitol bilong Samoa stat long 1959 i kam inap nau.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.

English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol planti 'fruit pastry', na i gat ol epol we ol i wokim 'pastry' long en i save stap long olgeta taim bilong yia, na ol 'cherry pastry' na 'plum pastry' em ol i save mekim long taim bilong sama (summer).

Tok Pisin: Robin Uthappa i mekim nambawan sko (score) we i winim olgeta bikpela sko bilong dispela 'inning', em i mekim 70-pela 'runs' long 41-pela bal tasol taim em i paitim bal long mak bilong 11-pela foa na 2-pela siks.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.

Tok Pisin: Ol meri i save kukim kaikai autsait long sait bilong haus; ol stoa em ol tebol we i op na i lukluk i go long rot. Ol i save yusim ol ston long bildim ol haus.

Tok Pisin: Long ol 'developed country' yu bai no inap long harim wankain mak bilong komplen long kwaliti bilong wara ol bris i pundaun.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.
English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save insait long Metro em ol i save mekim long tok ples Catalan tasol, tasol ol samting we ol i no plen long mekim em wanpela 'automatic' sistem i save mekim dispela tok save long ol kainkain tok ples olsem Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.

English: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
Tok Pisin: Tude planti Sámi i mekim ol wok bilong tude. Wok bilong givim sevis long turis em i save wanpela impoten rot bilong kisim mani long ol Sápmi, long Sámi eria.
English: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
Tok Pisin: Perian tok ples em i isi na grama (grammar) bilong em i isi long bihainim.
English: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
Tok Pisin: Stat long 1988 na i kam inap long nau, olgeta 'ballot box' i mas i stap ples klia na ol lain bilong vot (vote) na ol lain bilong was long vot i ken lukim olsem i no gat envelop (envelope) i stap long stat bilong vot na i no gat narapela envelop ol i putim gen i go antap long ol envelop we ol i kaunim pinis na olgeta i kam long ol lain we i gat atoriti long vot.
English: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em Netherlands, wantaim Anna Jochemsen we i pinis long namba nain ples long 'women's standing class' insait long Super-G long aste, na Finland wantaim Katja Saarinen we i pinis namba ten insait long dispela seim (same) geim (game).
English: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i wankain long Norway, Sweden na New Zealand, tasol em i narakain liklik (eksampel long Netherlands, dispela namba em i 40).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Wanpela we i wok insait long 'garage' klostu long ples bilong eksiden i tok: "I gat ol pikinini we i wok long wet i stap long i go long narapela sait bilong rot na olgeta i wok long singaut na krai."
predictions: Wanpela man i wokim wok long wanpela garis tupela i stap pinis long ples we dispela accident i kamap, em i tok: "Ol i gat pikinini i waitim long krosim rot na ol i olsem olgeta i skrim na krai."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.
Tok Pisin: Risets i bin painimaut olsem sans bilong ol meri long kisim MS em i tupela taim moa long ol man.
English: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
Tok Pisin: South Africa em i nambawan tim insait long dispela tonamen (tournament) na em i stat gut taim em i winim tim bilong Zambia we i stap namba 5 insait long tonamen 26 - 00.
English: A couple may decide it is not in their best interest, or in the interest of their child, to raise a baby.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela marit i ken mekim disisen olsem em i no gutpela long ol, ol em i no gutpela long pikinini bilong ol, sapos ol i gat wanpela bebi.
English: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.
Tok Pisin: Nau sains (science) i soim olsem dispela traipela 'carbon economy' em i rausim 'biosphere' long wanpela 'stable state' we i bin sapotim ol manmeri long tupela milien yia i go pinis.
English: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.
Tok Pisin: I no gat wanpela "taim bilong ren" na "taim bilong san": mak bilong ren i save stap klostu wankain mak long olgeta yia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Olgeta i ron i kam bek long ples we eksiden i bin kamap long en.
predictions: Olgeta i ron bek long ples we aksident i bin kamap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela bikbus em ol i no mangro na ples tais tasol — ol i gat sampela bilong laspela bikpela bikbus we i bin karamapim Gangetic plain.
English: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
Tok Pisin: Cochamó Valley -nambawan hap bilong mekim 'climbing' long Chile, em ol kolim Yosemite of South America, em i gat ol kainkain bikpela 'granite wall' na 'crag'.
English: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'bug' em ol entomolojist (entomologist) i save yusim long toktok long dispela grup bilong ol binatang.
English: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'show' em pastaim em ol 'voice actor' we i no gat planti save na ekspiriens (experience) i ektim, na ol i bilong East Texas.
English: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wil (wheel) i senisim graun long kainkain we. Bikpela samting tru we wil i mekim long yumi em i givim yumi isipela 'transportation' we i save muv hariap moa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol narapela samting bilong toktok long en taim ol i bung long Bali em pasin bilong seivim ol bikbus bilong ples graun we i stap yet, na serim ol teknoloji long helpim ol kantri we i wok long divelop yet long bihainim ol rot we i no inap long mekim planti polusen (pollution) taim ol i wok long divelop.
predictions: Ol narapela samting long agenda long Bali em i inkludim saveim ol bikbus bilong world, na sanapim teknoloji long halivim ol kantri we i stap gro long olsem na no i save polusim planti.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela sko (score) em i wanpela poin win, 21 na 20, na i pinisim 15-pela geim (game ) we All Blacks i bin winim.
English: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim ol spesel taua we seip (shape) bilong ol i olsem ol 'pyramid', na ol i kolim ol 'ziggurats', em ol i save bildim olsem pat bilong ol tempel.
English: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
Tok Pisin: Aerosmith i bin stopim ol narapela konset (concert) we i stap yet long raun bilong ol.
English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim i go pinis long dispela wik, wanpela helikopta (helicopter) i 'crash' na i kilim tripela lain na narapela tripela i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong ol.
English: Large areas further north are quite sparsely populated and some is nearly uninhabited wilderness.
Tok Pisin: Ol bikpela eria longwe long not em i no gat planti manmeri na sampela ples we i no gat manmeri long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Na tu, U.N i laik mekim ol laspela wok bilong stretim wanpela 'fund' bilong helpim ol kantri we i wok long pilim ol hevi bilong 'global warming'.
predictions: Yunaitid Neishons i gat wanpela hop tu pinisim wanpela fand long halivim kantri long olgeta samting ol i afektem long global wamin long kamapim gutpela tingting long ol samting i kamap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, sapos yu yusim dispela tok na nating, dispela tok em bai min kaikai i kam long 'central' na 'eastern' hap bilong Java ailan.
English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
Tok Pisin: 'Technological determinism' em i wanpela hap tok we i gat planti kainkain tingting we ol manmeri i save prektisim, stat long 'technology push' o 'technological imperative' i go long wanpela tingting we i tok olsem pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong graun em long bihainim ol lo bilong sains na kamapim ol teknoloji we i save bihainim ol dispela lo bilong sains.
English: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.
Tok Pisin: Narapela samting, em animal kaikai (ol anis, ol 'termite', na kiau) em ol i isi long kaikai, na tu ol i givim bikpela mak bilong ol 'protein' we i gat olgeta ol 'amino acid' we bodi i nidim.
English: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.
Tok Pisin: Ol insek em ol namba wan animal long stap long win. Dispela pasin bilong ol long flai i helpim ol long abrusim ol birua bilong ol na painim kaikai na pren bilong ol isi tru.
English: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.
Tok Pisin: Dispela i mekim na ol i gat planti liklik ples bilong hait long ol animal we i laik kaikaim ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela mani i ken i go long ol haus we tait wara i no inap long bagarapim ol, gutpela menejmen bilong wara, na planim kainkain kaikai.
predictions: Moni i save go long haus we i no ken wet, gutpla manejmen bilong wara, na diversifikesen bilong krop.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'Article' i nidim ol lain long tok orait long olgeta 'state' bipo long ol i ken mekim senis na ol 'state' i kisim 'central government' olsem na ol lain we ol i makim i no save stap.
English: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
Tok Pisin: Japanese kalsa bilong wok em i gat oda bilong em na em i moa fomol (formal) long we ol Westerner i save long en.
English: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
Tok Pisin: Nambawan lotu long Moldova em Orthodox Christian.
English: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
Tok Pisin: Dispela tok save i bin kamap bihain long Trump i toktok long telefon wantaim Presiden bilong kantri Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
English: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
Tok Pisin: Narapela samting, sampela 'saddle', dispela em ol English 'saddle', ol i gat ol 'safety bar' we i save larim 'stirrup leather' i pundaun i go daun long 'saddle' sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun i go baksait.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Fluke i bin rait olsem wok bilong sampela lain long stopim ol meri long toktok long ol samting we i no stret long helt bilong ol meri i no bin kamap.
predictions: Fluke i raitim olsem ol wok bilong ol lain long stopim ol meri long toktok long ol samting bilong ol meri i no lukautim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
Tok Pisin: Em i givim tok lukaut olsem, long dispela taim, No gat wanpela man i ken tok olsem wanpela kain plen bai inap long stopim ol pait i save kamap namel long ol seksen, kros na pait, na bikpela bagarap.
English: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
Tok Pisin: I no gat planti lain i sindaun long Greenland. Long ol tumbuna stori bilong ol Norway, ol i tok olsem Erik the Red em ol i bin rausim em long Iceland bikos em i bin kilim wanpela man, na taim em i travel i go long wes, em i painim Greenland na em i givim dispela nem long en.
English: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
Tok Pisin: Ol i tok olsem em i gat 20 samting krismas. Long wanpela tok save bilong Bieber, em i tok olsem "maski mi i no stap long dispela ples na mi no i stap insait long dispela eksiden, ol tingting na prea bilong mi i stap wantaim ol famili bilong dispela man husat i dai."
English: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
Tok Pisin: Long wanpela 'route', ol bikpela kampani i gat ol balus bilong ol yet, tasol long ol narapela 'route' na long ol liklik bisnis i bin i gat wanpela problem.
English: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
Tok Pisin: Ol i wok long traim yet long painimaut mak bilong dispela bikpela paia na em i bin kamapim wanem kain bagarap long Earth.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Em i kamap wantaim dispela laspela tingting bikos long planti gutpela toktok na 'encouragment' we ol meri na man i salim i go long em na i tokim em olsem marasin bilong spesim pikinini em i mas kamap olsem wanpela sevis we olgeta haus sik i mas givim.
predictions: Em i kamapim dispela kain toksave long bagarap bilong ol bikpela toktok bilong ol man na meri husat i tok olsem ol i laikim ol medisin bilong kontrasepison i mas kisim tingting olsem wanem samting em i mas stap long medisin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela samting we planti manmeri husat i wok long mekim plen long i gat 'gap-year' i wok long mekim em long travel na lainim samting.
English: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, wanpela rot we i go long olgeta hap bilong kantri em bai i westim mani bikos i gat sampela kar tasol, olsem na ol nupela rot bilong wokim kar i kamap bilong daunim prais bilong kar.
English: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
Tok Pisin: Ol wara we i stap insait long ples em ol gutpela samting bilong mekim holide long en.
English: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
Tok Pisin: Ancient China i gat wanpela narakain we bilong soim ol kainkain time; wanwan 'stage' bilong China o wanwan famili we i holim pawa em i wanpela 'dynasty'.
English: The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
Tok Pisin: Rom i bin go pas long lukautim wok bilong sios long tausen yia na planti pawa na moni i stap long Rom. Dispela i mekim na planti manmeri i wok long i gat tupela tingting sapos em i inapim dispela bilip, o nogat.

English: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Taim dispela pait i pinis bihain long ol i karim ol lain i kisim bagarap i go long haus sik, kain olsem 40-pela bilong ol narapela kalabus lain i stap autsait na i no laik long go bek long sel (cell) bilong ol.
predictions: Wen olsem ol i stopim pasin bilong pait na ol i kisim ol i go long ospital, long yad i stap olsem 40 manmeri bilong ol i no go bek long sel bilong ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
Tok Pisin: Sampela ripot i tok olsem namba bilong ol lain i dai em i et, na ripot i kam long ol ofis i tok olsem 30-pela lain i kisim bagarap; tasol tru tru namba em ol i no save yet.
English: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem oll 'comet' i bin kisim wanpela sampela samting we i kamapim wara graun wantaim ol narapela 'organic matter' we i ken kamapim ol 'protein' na sapotim laip.
English: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.
Tok Pisin: Dispela i mekim na ol i gat planti liklik ples bilong hait long ol animal we i laik kaikaim ol.
English: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
Tok Pisin: Nuclear agency bilong Japan i tok olsem, ol i painimaut olsem i gat 'radioactive caesium' na 'iodine' long dispela diwai.
English: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
Tok Pisin: Bipo planti fama (farmer) i save mekim 'subsistence agriculture' na dispela pasin em i stap yet long planti kantri we i no divelop yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
Tok Pisin: Mi no save sapos yu luksave long dispela o nogat, tasol planti bilong ol kago i kam long Central America i kam insait long kantri 'duty-free'.
English: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, taim yu ritim dispela 'grammar primer' em bai helpim yu tru long grama (grammar) bilong tok ples Persia na yu ken save gut long ol hap toktok.
English: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".
Tok Pisin: Nambawan lokel bia em 'Number One', em i no wanpela narakain bia, tasol em i nais na i mekim man i pilim gut. Wanpela narapela lokel bia em i "Manta".
English: Many common formats (APS family of formats, for example) are equal to or closely approximate this aspect ratio.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol fomet (format) we ol lain i save yusim (eksampel, APS famili bilong ol fomet) em i wankain o klostu wankain olsem dispela 'aspect ratio'.
English: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong makim spes bipo long travela i go long dispela ples bai mekim tingting bilong ol i stap isi olsem ol bai gat sampela hap bilong slip taim ol i kamap long hap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol i luk olsem ol i no save gut long pilai wantaim ol sista bilong ol long hap saut, tasol taim tonamen (tournament) i wok long kamap, ol South Africa i wok long pilai gut moa.
English: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel em raun, kisim foto, na kisim save long ol 'orangatuang' taim yu go long Borneo.
English: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany.
Tok Pisin: Insait long tupela wik tasol ol soldia bilong America na ol Free French i mekim hap saut bilong France i kamap fri na ol i wok long i go long Germany.
English: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The town is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.
Tok Pisin: Apia em i kapitol bilong Samoa. Dispela taun i stap long ailan bilong Upolu na i gat populese we i aninit long 40,000.
English: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i save stadi long 'nature' na ol 'philosophy' i save lukluk long ol 'classical texts', kain olsem, Bible long tok ples Latin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
Tok Pisin: Ol singa (singer) we planti lain i save long ol long olgeta hap bilong kantri i mekim ol bhajan, o ol lotu singsing long lek bilong Shri Shyam.
English: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
Tok Pisin: Tupelal singsing bilong dispela muvi, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars, em ol i makim olsem 'best original song'. Ol i makim Lionsgate studio 26-pela taim—dispela em i moa long olgeta narapela 'studio'.
English: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok, i luk olsem dispela bodi i stap insait long hap long kain olsem wanpela de.
English: Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies.
Tok Pisin: Tude, ol insek (insect) we i no save foldim wing bilong ol em ol 'dragon flies' na ol 'mayflies'.
English: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
Tok Pisin: Stat long 1988 na i kam inap long nau, olgeta 'ballot box' i mas i stap ples klia na ol lain bilong vot (vote) na ol lain bilong was long vot i ken lukim olsem i no gat envelop (envelope) i stap long stat bilong vot na i no gat narapela envelop ol i putim gen i go antap long ol envelop we ol i kaunim pinis na olgeta i kam long ol lain we i gat atoriti long vot.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.
Tok Pisin: Congress i no gat pawa long makim na kisim takis, na, bikos i bin no gat 'national executive' o 'judiciary', em i save yusim ol 'state authorities', husat i no save wok wantaim em long planti taim, long mekim ol manmeri i bihainim ol 'act' bilong em.
English: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
Tok Pisin: Sekim 'label' long ol 'first aid instruction' bilong dipela posin.
English: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
Tok Pisin: ASUS Eee PC, we ol i bin mekim presentesen bilong em i go long olgeta hap bilong graun bikos em i ken seivim man na em i ken mekim planti impoten wok, em i kamap olsem wanpela bikpela topik we ol lain i wok long toktok long em long 2007 Taipei IT Month.
English: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
Tok Pisin: Em i givim yumi trein (train), kar, ma planti narapela masin bilong 'transportation'.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol i stap kol moa long ol ples we i raunim ol long san na long nait ol i hot moa long ol ples we i raunim ol.
predictions: Ol i kolia long samting we i stap antap long graun long dei na ol i warma long nait.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The bridge is scheduled to be fully operational in September 2017, when the Brazilian customs checkpoints are expected to be finished.
Tok Pisin: Dispela bris em ol i makim taim bilong em long op long Septemba 2017, taim ol i pinisim ol 'customs checkpoints' bilong ol Brazil.
English: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
Tok Pisin: Scotturb Bus 403 i save ron olgeta taim i go long Sintra, na stop long Cabo da Roca.
English: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela ain i no i stap, o sapos yu no tingting long werim soks we ol i ainim, orait yu ken traim yusim wanpela 'hairdryer', sapos em i stap.
English: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.
Tok Pisin: Long mun i go pinis, wanpela komisen (commission) bilong presiden i mekim rekomendesen (recommendation) olsem CEP bilong bipo i mas risain (resign) olsem wanpela hap wok bilong kantri i muv i go long ol nupela ileksen.
English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain Egypt i bildim long 'third century' BCE, Great Pyramid em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela pyramid straksa we ol i wokim long givim ona long wanpela Pharaoh we i dai pinis.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: "'Thermal behavior' bilong ol i no stap wankain olsem ol bikpela hul bilong ston long Earth we i save i gat wanpela kain tempritsa (temperature), tasol ol i stap wankain olsem tempritsa bilong ol dip hol i stap long graun," Glen Cushing bilong United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team na bilong Northern Arizona University we i stap long Flagstaff, Arizona i tok.
predictions: Em i tok, "Thermal behavior bilong ol i no stap olsem ol bikpela kav long graun long Erth we ol i save lukautim wanpela taim olsem ol i gat wanpela temperature we i no ken senisim, tasol em i stap olsem ol i gat wanpela samting long ol i dai pinis long graun," toktok Glen Cushing bilong USGS Astrogeology Tim na bilong Northern Arizona University we i stap long Flagstaff, Arizona.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'safari' bilong wokabaut (ol i save kolim tu olsem wanpela "'bush walk'", "hiking safari", o 'going "'footing'") em i pasin bilong wokabaut, long sampela aua o long sampela de.
English: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
Tok Pisin: Bikos ol dispela eria i no gat planti manmeri, planti taim 'light pollution' em bai i no wanpela problem, yu bai inap long lukim ol sta.
English: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait bilong dispela samting, ol kondisen bilong ais na sno (snow) em i nomol long planti kantri, na ol kar i save ron i go i kam gut long olgeta de bilong yia.
English: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu stap insait long dispela 'zone', yu ken kalapim boda na yu bai i no inap go long 'passport control checkpoint' gen.
English: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'suit' em ol stendet bisnis klos, na ol wanwok i save kolim wanpela narapela long nem bilong famili bilong ol o ol taitol bilong ol long wok.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Long France, pasin bilong 'vote' em i no pasin bilong yusim teknoloji: ol vota (voter) i save go long wanpela tebol, putim wanpela we ol i bin prinim pinis we i soim wanem kendidet (candidate) ol i laik makim i go long wanpela envelop (envelope).
predictions: Long France, votim i bin stap olsem wanpela olsem wanpela olgeta taim: ol vota i save wokim olgeta long wanpela 'booth', putim wanpela pre-printed sheet bilong peper bilong ol i soim long wanpela envelob.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, em i luk olsem dispela hap tok ol i bin raitim bihain bai em i ken i stap olsem wanpela 'label'.
English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
Tok Pisin: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.
English: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel em olsem, ol i no gat kon, o tomato, o potato, o kakau, na no gat wanpela bilong ol lain bilong bipo long Rom i bin teistim wanpela 'turkey'.
English: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol tingting long mining bilong 'technological determinism' i gat tupela bikpela tingting insait long ol: wanpela em i olsem divelopmen bilong teknoloji i bihainim wanpela rot we kalsa na politiks i no inap long senisim, na narapela em i olsem teknoloji i kamapim "senis" long ol komuniti bikos dispela ol pasin na tingting em ol manmeri i bon wantaim na teknoloji i no kamapim.
English: Liggins followed in his father’s footsteps and entered a career in medicine.
Tok Pisin: Liggins i bihainim papa bilong em na i kisim wok long sait bilong marasin.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Taim ol ofisa i sekim nem na ples bilong dispela vota (voter) pinis, dispela vota bai putim dispela envelop (envelope) i go insait long 'ballot box' na putim siknesa bilong em long list bilong ol lain i kam na makim kendidet bilong ol.
predictions: Bihaenim ofisials i verifai vota bilong en, vota i putim envelob long bok bilong vot na i signim votim rol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting bilong bipo we i soim ol dispela 'sewage system' em ol i bin painim ol long ol haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan bilong Crete na Santorini long Greece.
English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol bikpela bilip bilong ol Kristen em i olsem ol i mas yusim gut mani na kago bilong ol long helpim ol narapela we i gat pen na hevi o i no gat mani na kaikai. Ol i bilip olsem mani bilong sios em i bilong mekim dispela wok.
English: Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela topik we dispela ripot i toktok long en, em mak bilong Jerusalem we i stap olsem ples holi long tupela kantri wantaim na hevi bilong Jordan Valley.
English: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
Tok Pisin: 'Re-entry shock' i save kamap hariap moa long 'culture shock' (i no gat 'honeymoon phase'), na em i save stap longpela taim na em i ken kamap long mak we i bikpela moa long 'culture shock'.
English: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
Tok Pisin: Ol travela i ken bungim kainkain animal bilong bagarapim klos na kaikai we ol i no klia long en insait long ples we ol i kam long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Lo bilong France long ileksen i tok olsem ol i mas putim ol 'code' long ol dispela wok bilong makim kendidet.
predictions: Fransis elektoral lo i stap long strongpla kodi long ol wok bilong eleksan.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting bilong bipo we i soim ol dispela 'sewage system' em ol i bin painim ol long ol haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan bilong Crete na Santorini long Greece.
English: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
Tok Pisin: Yu bai no inap westim taim bilong yu long wokabaut hap aua i go long dispela liklik ples we i gat ol narapela kain samting.
English: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
Tok Pisin: Tok ples Italian em ol lain i save wok insait long steit (state) i save yusim tu long toktok long olgeta de na ol i save yusim Latin long mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) bilong lotu.
English: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean.
Tok Pisin: Long hap not bilong rijen em Sahel i raunim, na long hap na hap wes Atlantic Ocean i raunim.
English: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem bai i gat moa 'maria' long sait i stap klostu bikos 'crust' em i 'thin' moa. Em i isi moa long 'lava' long kam antap long autsait.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Stat long 1988 na i kam inap long nau, olgeta 'ballot box' i mas i stap ples klia na ol lain bilong vot (vote) na ol lain bilong was long vot i ken lukim olsem i no gat envelop (envelope) i stap long stat bilong vot na i no gat narapela envelop ol i putim gen i go antap long ol envelop we ol i kaunim pinis na olgeta i kam long ol lain we i gat atoriti long vot.
predictions: Sins 1988, balot bokses mas ken lukluk long olsem vota na olsem ol i lukim olsem no gat envelob i stap long stat bilong vot na no gat envelob i adim olsem olgeta bilong ol vota we i bin kisim autorisasion na olgeta bilong ol vota we i bin kisim autorisasion.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain bilong bipo long Rom i no bin i gat kaikai we i kam long America o Asia we nau ol i stap long Europe long sampela handret yia bihain.
English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'shooter' insait long dispela 'supplementary pest control' test em ol 'ranger' i was long ol, bikos dispela test em ol i monitarim (monitor) na skelim 'effectiveness' bilong em.
English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
Tok Pisin: Em i no samting bilong sem long en: em i no narakain long ol narapela samting ol manmeri i save pret long em na ol narapela samting ol planti manmeri i save les long en.
English: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
Tok Pisin: 'Flat white' kofi em i narakain samting long ol lain Australia. Wanpela 'short black' em i wanpela ' expresso', 'cappuccino' we i kam wantaim krim (i no 'froth'), na ol i no save mekim ti we i gat milk insait long en.
English: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela narapela samting we i narakain em i olsem taim ol manmeri we i no gat planti samting i kaikai kaiakia bilong ol taim ol i sindaun long ol sia, ol maniman i save laik long i gat ol bikpela bung kaikai we ol i save slip long sait bilong ol na kaikai.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol kendidet (candidate) i ken salim ol lain we i makim ol long go na witnesim olgeta wanwan hap bilong wok. Long avinun, ol volentia (volunteer) i save kaunim ol vot (vote) na i gat ol lain i save bihainim ol prosidia (procedure) bilong supavaisim (supervise) wok bilong ol.
predictions: Kandidet i ken senap ol representetiv long lukim evripla pat long dispela proses. Long taim bilong nait, vot i kisim namba long ol volantia i kamap long strong supavisin, bihainim ol spesifik prosedua.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
Tok Pisin: Moa long wan tausen yia, dispela lotu bilong ol Kristen i bin bungim ol kantri bilong Europe wantaim, maski ol i gat wanwan tok ples na kastom bilong ol yet.
English: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
Tok Pisin: Dispela liklik ples Haldarsvík em yu ken stap long em na lukluk i go long ailan bilong Eysturoy we i stap klostu na em i gat wanpela narapela kain sios we seip (shape) bilong em i olsem 'octagon'.
English: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
Tok Pisin: Taim Federal Government i kam na i kisim ol mani bilong Mersey haus sik long Devonport, long Tasmania, gavman bilong dispela 'state' na ol sampela MP bilong gavman i tok strong olsem dispela pasim em i trik bilong redi long ileksen we bai kamap long Novemba.
English: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela em ol i salim i go long George Washington long Julai 6, na em i ritim long ol soldia bilong em long New York long Julai 9. Wanpela kopi i kamap long London long Ogas 10.
English: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
Tok Pisin: Ol gem i stat long 10:00am wantaim gutpela weda na maski i bin i gat liklik ren long moning, em i pinis hariap, dispela de em i gutpela tru long pilai ragbi 7's.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: ASUS Eee PC, we ol i bin mekim presentesen bilong em i go long olgeta hap bilong graun bikos em i ken seivim man na em i ken mekim planti impoten wok, em i kamap olsem wanpela bikpela topik we ol lain i wok long toktok long em long 2007 Taipei IT Month.
predictions: ASUS Eee PC, i bin kamap long olgeta hap long graun long save moni na long ol samting em i save mekim, i bin kamap wanpela bikpela toktok long 2007 Taipei IT Month.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim ol spesel taua we seip (shape) bilong ol i olsem ol 'pyramid', na ol i kolim ol 'ziggurats', em ol i save bildim olsem pat bilong ol tempel.
English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela geim (game) bilong 'series' bai kamap long Ellis Park long Johannesburg long wik i kam, taim ol Sprinboks i pilai agensim ol Australia.
English: They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.
Tok Pisin: Ol i mekim tupela 'experiment' we tupela i makim DNA insait long 'phage' wantaim wanpela 'radioactive phosphorus' o tupela i makim 'protein' bilong 'phage' wantaim 'radioactive sulfur'.
English: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).
Tok Pisin: Na tu, 'blogging' "i save fosim ol sumatin long save moa long ol samting we i wok long kamap long komuniti we ol i stap long en." Dispela nid long inapim nid bilong ol lain i ritim blog bilong ol i mekim na ol sumatin i gat moa save na kamap 'interesting' (Toto, 2004).
English: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
Tok Pisin: Planti manmeri i no ting olsem pasin bilong i stap isi na lainim samting em impoten long ol travela (traveller) taim ol i kam bek gen long haus bilong ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Tasol maket bilong salim 'laptop' i go long pablik' bai i gat kainkain prodak na i senis olgeta bihain long ASUS i kisim 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award we Executive Yuan bilong Republic of China i givim.
predictions: Tasol maket bilong ol kainkain samting em laptop komputa bai kamap olsem wanpela samting em bai wari na senisim bihain long ASUS i winim 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award bilong Executive Yuan bilong Republic bilong China.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
Tok Pisin: Ol wok bilong painim dispela hap we 'crash' i kamap i bin bungim weda (weather) nogut na ples we i hat long man i go long en.
English: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).
Tok Pisin: Eksampel em, “'learning” and “socialization'” em ol impoten motivesen (motivation) we i save mekim ol manmeri i laik long yusim intanet (James et al., 1995).
English: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
Tok Pisin: Adekoya i bin stap long Edinburgh Sheriff Court na ol i sasim wm long kilim pikinini man bilong em.
English: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
Tok Pisin: Dispela progrem i stat long 8:30 p.m. long lokel taim (15.00 UTC).
English: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta lain i ken kisim 'enlightenment'. Wanpela samting tasol we i sanap namel long dispela as tingting em hevi na 'negativity' bilong yumi yet.

predictions: Dispela websait bilong stesen i toktok long show em "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken lukim ol 'pyramid' long tudak na yu ken lukim ol tu bipo long 'show' i stat.
English: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.
Tok Pisin: Ol mosasaurus i bin i stap olsem nambawan wel animal long dispela taim, no gat narapela animal i inap long kaikaim ol, olsem na ol i no pret long wanpela samting. Ol i save pret long narapela mosasaurus tasol.
English: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.
Tok Pisin: Pastaim em i bin stap long James Paget Hospital long Great Yarmouth.
English: While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage.
Tok Pisin: Taim no gat man i save long husat i raitim ol dispela hap tok, ol i save olsem taim em i nupela yet, dispela bikpela 'parchment' dokumen (sais bilong en, em 29¾ 'inches' na 24½ 'inches') em ol i bin rolim bai em i ken stap long storej (storage).
English: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany.
Tok Pisin: Bihain tasol long pait i stat, Britain i mekim wanpela 'naval blockade' long Germany.

English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.

predictions: Long taim bilong nupela yet, dispela 'show' i stap long TogiNet Radio, wanpela 'internet radio site' em i hamamas long 'talk radio'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'bill' em i tok olsem ol vidio geim (video game) bilong pait we ol i salim long Carlifonia em ol i mas makim wantaimwanpela 'decal reading' "18" na mekim ol lain i brukim dispela lo long baim $1000 long wanwan taim ol i brukim dispela lo.
English: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany.
Tok Pisin: Bihain tasol long pait i stat, Britain i mekim wanpela 'naval blockade' long Germany.
English: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.
Tok Pisin: Maski ol i luk olsem ol i stap isi, ol 'bison', 'elk', 'moose', bea, na klostu olgeta bikpela animal i ken pait.

Ol dispela ol pasin bilong lukautim ol meme em ol i wok long yusim yet long tude.

English: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel bilong ol 'on-site activity' em painim pis, kisim foto, lukim ol pisin, na raun long ol 'park' na stadim infomesen long 'ecosystem'.
English: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.

English: In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love.

English: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.

English: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.

Tok Pisin: I luk olsem bai i gat moa 'maria' long sait i stap klostu bikos 'crust' em i 'thin' moa. Em i isi moa long 'lava' long kam antap long autsait.
English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.

English: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong yusim sip long muvim ol samting em i nambawan we tru bilong muvim bikpela namba bilong ol kago o ol manmeri long solwara.
English: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
Tok Pisin: Maski dispela em i wanpela 'stereotype' we i no stret, nambawan we long stap long Paris em long mekim ol gutpela pasin, ekt olsem wanpela man o meri husat i "bien élevé" (papamama bilong em i skulim em gut). Em bai mekim isi long i go i kam long Paris.
English: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
Tok Pisin: Teksi bilong serim wantaim narapela pasindia em i gutpela rot bilong sindaun gut na i go i kam hariap long ol ples i stap klostu, kain olsem Paro (Nu 150) na Punakha (Nu 200).
English: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wanwan gavman long givim ol paspot (passport) we ol i no makim (X) long man o meri o givim ol dokumen long soim senis long nem na man i go long meri o meri i go long man em i narakain narakain long wanwan gavman.
English: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon".
Tok Pisin: Long 15 August 1940, ol Allies i holimpasim hap saut bilong France, the pait em ol i bin kolim "Operation Dragoon".

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i mekim risets long Princeton University long United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i mekim ripot long wanpela nupela 'specie' we i kamap insait long tupela generesen (generation), tasol ol i ting long dispela proses (process) i kisim longpela taim moa, em i kamap bikos long 'breeding' i kamap namel long Darwin finch bilong dispela eria, Geospiza fortes, na cactus finch we i kam long narapela eria, Geospiza conirostris.
English: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol i bin mekim wanpela test we ol i kolim PALM, ZMapp i stap olsem wanpela 'control', dispela em i min olsem ol saintis i yusim em olsem wanpela 'baseline' na i skelim wanem we ol narapela tritmen i wok bihainim em.
English: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun long wanpela hos, tasol lek bilong em i pas long 'stirrup', hos i ken pulim ol taim em i ranawe. Long daunim mak bilong dispela hevi long kamap, ol 'rider' i mas mekim samting long abrusim dispela.
English: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
Tok Pisin: Ol Gurani em ol impoten as ples manmeri we i stap nau long ples we ol i kolim Eastern Paraguay, na ol i save raun na pasinim abus na tu, ol i save planim kaikai long gaden.
English: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
Tok Pisin: Mausman bilong Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman i tok: "Angola i wok long go long mak we i nogut tru long dispela 'outbreak' na dispela hevi em i stap nogut tru long Angola," em i tok.

Tok Pisin: Wankain taim yu, ol man i mas werim ol trausers we i karamapim ni (knee).
