[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
Tok Pisin: Long France, pasin bilong 'vote' em i no pasin bilong yusim teknoloji: ol vota (voter) i save go long wanpela tebol, putim wanpela we ol i bin prinim pinis we i soim wanem kendidet (candidate) ol i laik makim i go long wanpela envelop (envelope).
English: They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save gat spesol kaikai, dring na ektiviti bilon amamas, long mekim ol 'guest' i amamas, na mekim ol i stap insait long banis.
English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
Tok Pisin: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.
English: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
Tok Pisin: No ken bagarapim dispela ples taim yu put mak ol skrapim 'graffiti' i go insait long ol samting.
English: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, taim ol nupela rot bilong rait i kamap, pensil (pencil) i kisim wanpela posisen we i daunbilo na i no gat planti i yusim em.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Swirl the two dry powders together and then, with clean wet hands, squeeze them into a ball.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Miksim tupela drai pauda wantaim na bihain, wantaim han we i klin na wet, skwisim (squeeze) ol na mekim wanpela bal.
predictions: Swirlim tupela drai pauda wantaim na bihainim, usim han bilong yu we i wokim olsem, presim ol i go insait long wanpela bola.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He arrived in the US with 4 cents to his name, a book of poetry, and a letter of recommendation from Charles Batchelor (his manager in his previous job) to Thomas Edison.
Tok Pisin: Em i kamap long US wantaim 4 cents, wanpela 'poetry' buk, na wanpela leta bilong rekomendesen i kam long Charles Batchelor (meneja bilong em long wok em i bin mekim bipo) i go long Thomas Edison.
English: Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
Tok Pisin: Sampela senis o rikwes em yu mas tokim 'travel agent' pastaim na i no go stret long hotel.
English: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'content theories' i save lukluk long painimaut wanem ol samting i save kirapim bel bilong ol manmeri o i tasim bel na tingting bilong ol.
English: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
Tok Pisin: Long Tonga, no gat ripot bilong bikpela bagarap i kamap long ol samting o long ol manmeri, tasol i no gat pawa bilong lait, na dispela i mekim na ol atoriti long Tonga i no bin kisim tok lukaut bilong tsunami we PTWC i bin salim.
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, bihain long Revolution ol wok i op long olgeta man long larim ol man i gat driman na i save wok hat long mekim ol gutpela wok we ol i laik long mekim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela wara i stap long han bilong yu bai i 'react' wantaim ol 'layer' we i stap autsait, we bai i pilim narakain na kamapim wanpela kain sel.
predictions: Ol wata long han bilong yu bai reaksim wantaim ol laplap long auta, em bai mekim yu save rausim bel na mekim wanpela soa bilong skel.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, kisim tok save bilong ol atoriti, bihainim olgeta sain, na ritim na bihainim gut ol tok lukaut.
English: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
Tok Pisin: Ol sik we i save kalap hariap, o ol animal we i save bagarapim ol kilim ol manmeri wantaim fos, em ol i no kam aninit long dispela nem 'pest'.
English: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
Tok Pisin: Ol wanwan hap bilong stori em ol i soim antap long o 'pyramid' na ol i save mekim lait i kamap long ol kainkain 'pyramid'.
English: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.
Tok Pisin: Ol i bin ting olsem em i laik resis gen long kamap olsem presiden long 2016.
English: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long wanpela wik we ol lus i kamap long 'midterm election', Bush i toktok long wanpela lain manmeri na i tokim ol long 'expansion' we bai i kamap long 'trade' long Asia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol siti bilong Harappa na Mohenjo-daro i gat wanpela toilet we i yusim wara long klostu olgeta haus, naol i join i go long wanpela narapela kain 'sewage system'.
predictions: Ol siti bilong Harappa na Mohenjo-daro i gat wanpela toalet we i save wasim wota long ol haus bilong ol, i stap wantaim wanpela gutpela sistem bilong wota rausim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i lukim Foster Care System olsem wanpela ples we i seif long ol dispela pikinini.
English: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
Tok Pisin: Planti manmeri i no ting olsem pasin bilong i stap isi na lainim samting em impoten long ol travela (traveller) taim ol i kam bek gen long haus bilong ol.
English: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol tingting long mining bilong 'technological determinism' i gat tupela bikpela tingting insait long ol: wanpela em i olsem divelopmen bilong teknoloji i bihainim wanpela rot we kalsa na politiks i no inap long senisim, na narapela em i olsem teknoloji i kamapim "senis" long ol komuniti bikos dispela ol pasin na tingting em ol manmeri i bon wantaim na teknoloji i no kamapim.
English: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
Tok Pisin: Dispela Report i stat wantaim wanpela askim long i mas i gat 'open debate' na wanbel long wanpela tingting i kamap long polisi bilong United States i go long Middle East.
English: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
Tok Pisin: France em i namba seventin kantri long European Union long kisim taim nogut long dispela vaires (virus); bihain long Austria, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece na Italy.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol samting bilong bipo we i soim ol dispela 'sewage system' em ol i bin painim ol long ol haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan bilong Crete na Santorini long Greece.
predictions: Ol bagarap bilong sewage system i lukim long haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan long Crete na Santorini long Greece.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Large areas further north are quite sparsely populated and some is nearly uninhabited wilderness.
Tok Pisin: Ol bikpela eria longwe long not em i no gat planti manmeri na sampela ples we i no gat manmeri long en.
English: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.
Tok Pisin: Hershey na Chase i bin yusim 'phages', o ol vaires (virus), long putim DNA bilong ol yet i go insait long wanpela 'bacterium'.
English: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, tupela 'specie' bilong pis i pinis olgeta, na tupela narapela em klostu i laik pinis olgeta, wanpela bilong ol em i 'humpback chub'.
English: As knowledge of Greek declined, the West found itself cut off from its Greek philosophical and scientific roots.
Tok Pisin: Taim save bilong ol Greek i go daun, West i lusim ol tingting bilong Greek long sains (science) na filosofi (philosophy).
English: Since students are often the most critical audience, the blog writer begins to strive to improve writing to avoid criticism.
Tok Pisin: Bikos ol sumatin em ol i save mekim planti toktok sapos samting i no stret, dispela sumatin we i raitim blog bai i stat long rait gut long abrusim ol toktok we i tok olsem em no rait gut.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: I gat ol toilet bilong bipotaim tru long Egypt, Persia na China. Long hap bilong ol Rome, ol toilet em ol i stap olsem hap bilong ol pablik haus bilong waswas we ol man na meri i save bung wantaim.
predictions: Ol i gat toalet tu long ancient Egypt, Persia na China. Long Roman civilization, toalet i stap long ol taim long public bath haus we manmeri na meri i stap wantaim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol pasin we ol lain i save mekim long dispela holide em ol lain i no Kristen na ol kantri we i no Kristen kantri i save bihainim long olgeta hap bilong graun.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
English: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
Tok Pisin: Ancient China i gat wanpela narakain we bilong soim ol kainkain time; wanwan 'stage' bilong China o wanwan famili we i holim pawa em i wanpela 'dynasty'.
English: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
Tok Pisin: Ol Liberal i tok olsem ol wok bilong bildim bek gen ol samting we i bin bagarap i bin lukluk long givim ol wok kontrak bilong konstraksen (construction) i go long ol bisnis we i gat sampela luksave lain bilong ol i stap long Washington.
English: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
Tok Pisin: Ol eksiden we i kamap long skai i save kamap planti taim long Iran, we i gat ol olpela balus na ol i no save mentenim gut long mekim ol operesen bilong pablik na bilong militeri (military).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Taim yu ringim sampela lain we i stap tausen 'mile' longwe, yu wok long yusim wanpela 'satellite'.
predictions: Bai yu kolim wanpela man we i stap long bikpela bikpela mail bilong mil.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol animal i lukautim ol dispela pikinini, ol dispela 'feral' pikinini save soim ol pasin (we ol inap long mek) we i wankain olsem pasin bilong dispela animal we i lukautim ol, kain olsem pret o i no save wanem samting bilong mekim taim em i stap wantaim ol narapela manmeri.
English: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
Tok Pisin: South Shetland Islands, em ol i bin painim em long 1819, na moa long wanpela kantri i bin kisim em na em i gat planti senta, sikstinpela i bin ektif (active) yet long yia 2020.
English: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
Tok Pisin: Maus bilong em i gat moa long 70-pela tit we i sap olsem resa, wantaim wanpela narapela lain tit we i stap long ruf bilong maus. Dispela em i min olsem wanem samting em i bungim bai i no inap long ranawe.
English: They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.
Tok Pisin: Ol i mekim tupela 'experiment' we tupela i makim DNA insait long 'phage' wantaim wanpela 'radioactive phosphorus' o tupela i makim 'protein' bilong 'phage' wantaim 'radioactive sulfur'.
English: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long wanpela oganaisesen i ken i gat ol nupela na narapela kain we bilong mekim samting, ol lida i mas kamapim wanpela kalsa bilong kamapim ol nupela na narapela kain samting na tu, i mas i gat pasin bilong serim save na lainim samting wantaim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela 'satellite' long 'space' i kisim dispela kol (call) na salim em i kam daun bek gen, wantu tru.
predictions: Satelait long spes i kisim kol na em i reflektim bek daun, tasol em i kamap gutpela bikpela taim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
Tok Pisin: Tasol maket bilong salim 'laptop' i go long pablik' bai i gat kainkain prodak na i senis olgeta bihain long ASUS i kisim 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award we Executive Yuan bilong Republic of China i givim.
English: Atoms are so incredibly tiny that trillions of them could fit into the period at the end of this sentence.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'atom' em ol i liklik liklik tru na trilien (trillion) bilong ol bai i inap long fit i go inap long wanpela 'full stop' long pinis bilong wanpela sentens (sentence).
English: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i impoten we bilong luksave long wanem em ol 'verb' na wanem em ol 'object'.
English: People now write messages on computer screens, never having to come close to a sharpener.
Tok Pisin: Nau ol manmeri i save raitim ol tok save long ol komputa skrin (computer screen), na ol i no kam klostu long wanpela sapena (sharpener).
English: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008.
Tok Pisin: Insait long 1,400 manmeri we i givim tingting bilong ol bipo long 2010 ileksen, ol dispela ol kain husat i go agensim dispela tingting bilong Australia i kamap olsem wanpela 'republic' i go antap long 8 pesen (percent) long namba bilong 2008.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela 'satellite' em wanpela 'rocket' i bin salim i go long 'space'. Ol saintis i yusim ol 'telescope' long 'space' bikos 'atmosphere' bilong Earth i save tanim sampela bilong ol lait bilong yumi na hau yumi lukim ol samting.
predictions: Satelait i senis go long spes bilong wanpela roket. Sainsman i yusim teleskop long spes long dispela taim bikausim atmosfer bilong graun i bagarapim sampla bilong lain bilong yumi na lukluk.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu ringim sampela lain we i stap tausen 'mile' longwe, yu wok long yusim wanpela 'satellite'.
English: The correlation between brain pathology and behaviour supports scientists in their research.
Tok Pisin: Rilesensip namel long 'brain pathology' na pasin i sapotim ol saintis insait long risets bilong ol.
English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
Tok Pisin: Sapos kantri we yu bai go long en em ol lain i tok save long sampela samting we yu mas lukaut long en, sampela senis bai kamap long 'travel health insurance' o 'trip cancellation insurance' bilong yu.
English: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
Tok Pisin: Em tok long ol tok win olsem "ol maus wara bilong politiks na em i pasin bilong ol lain i no gat gutpela tingting".
English: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.
Tok Pisin: I no gat wanpela "taim bilong ren" na "taim bilong san": mak bilong ren i save stap klostu wankain mak long olgeta yia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol i save yusim wanpela jaient 'rocket' we longpela bilong em i winim 100 'feet' long putim wanpela 'telescope' long 'space'.
predictions: Em i nidim wanpela bikpela rakit long 100 fut antap long putim wanpela satellite o teleskop long spes.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, bihain long Revolution ol wok i op long olgeta man long larim ol man i gat driman na i save wok hat long mekim ol gutpela wok we ol i laik long mekim.
English: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
Tok Pisin: Long gutpela kodisen yu bai inap long karamapim ol bikpela hap moa sapos yu ski na i no wokabaut – tasol wanwan taim yu bai kisim ol spit bilong 'cross country skiing' taim yu no karim wanpela hevipela bek long ol dispela hap bilong ski.
English: However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, dispela em i no tru. Maski i gat samting we ol i raitim long baksait bilong wanpela dokumen, dispela em i no wanpela 'treasure map'.
English: Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday.
Tok Pisin: Xinhua i givim ripot olsem long Trinde ol lain bilong gavman we i wok long mekim investigesen (investigation) i painim tupela 'black box' we i save rekodim ol samting i kamp insait long balus.
English: This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i ples we ol 'coloniser' bilong British i bin kisim olsem bilong ol olsem na sapos yu laik lukim ol samting we i soim sain bilong ol 'coloniser' long bipo, dispela em i gutpela ples long stat.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela wil (wheel) i senisim graun long kainkain we. Bikpela samting tru we wil i mekim long yumi em i givim yumi isipela 'transportation' we i save muv hariap moa.
predictions: Ol weol i senisim wold long wanpela manar we i no belivim. Bikpela samting we weol i mekim long mipela em i givim mipela moa hevi na fast traim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken yusim ol British pound long olgeta hap bilong ailan na insait long ol Stanley credit cards na tu ol yu ken yusim United States dollar.
English: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
Tok Pisin: Las tru, i gat planti liklik pusi (wantaim ol dispela we yumi save lukautim long haus) we i save kaikai ol liklik abus kain olsem ol insek (insect), rat, palai, na pisin.
English: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'rip currents' em ol tait bilong solwara we i bruk long nambis na i wok long kam bek, planti taim long wanpela rip o kain samting olsem.
English: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
Tok Pisin: Dispela sik em ol pik i save karim, na ol moskito i save kisim long pik na givim i go long ol manmeri.
English: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
Tok Pisin: Ol pepa bilong kot i tok olsem, ol rabis long kem bilong UN em ol i no kilim gut ol binatang long en, dispela i mekim na ol binatang i go insait long wara Artibonite, wanpela bilong ol bikpela wara insait long kantri Haiti.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Em i givim yumi trein (train), kar, ma planti narapela masin bilong 'transportation'.
predictions: Em i bringim yumi tren, kar na planti ol narapela samting bilong transport.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October.
Tok Pisin: Dispela komisen (commission) em i wanpela samting we Martelly i mekim bikos long ol 'anit-regime' protes we i wok long kamap long olgeta hap na i stat long Oktoba.
English: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
Tok Pisin: Long mun i go pinis Iran i kisim wanpela bikpela disasta (disaster) bihain long planti yia taim wanpela balus we i wok long i go long Armenia i 'crash', na i kilim 168 manmeri we i stap long balus.
English: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
Tok Pisin: Long 1976, em i givim edvais long Carter long 'foreign policy', na bihain em i kisim ples bilong Henry Kissinger na wok olsem National Security Advisor (NSA) long yia 1977 i go long 1981.
English: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela kos bai stap long 2-5-pela de na bai i gat 'role play', planti 'first aid' na sampela treining bilong ol samting bilong pait.
English: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
Tok Pisin: Ol wok bilong painim dispela hap we 'crash' i kamap i bin bungim weda (weather) nogut na ples we i hat long man i go long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.

Tok Pisin: Nau sains (science) i soim olsem dispela traipela 'carbon economy' em i rausim 'biosphere' long wanpela 'stable state' we i bin sapotim ol manmeri long tupela milien yia i go pinis.
English: Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade.
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim kaikai bilong ol long san taim 'photosynthesis' i kamap. Ol i save givim seid (shade).

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol ofisa i sekim nem na ples bilong dispela vota (voter) pinis, dispela vota bai putim dispela envelop (envelope) i go insait long 'ballot box' na putim siknesa bilong em long list bilong ol lain i kam na makim kendidet bilong ol.
English: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
Tok Pisin: South Africa i bin winim All Blacks (New Zealand) long 'rugby union' long Tri Nations geim (game) long Royal Bafokeng Stadium long Rustenburg, South Africa.
English: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem oll 'comet' i bin kisim wanpela sampela samting we i kamapim wara graun wantaim ol narapela 'organic matter' we i ken kamapim ol 'protein' na sapotim laip.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
Tok Pisin: U.S President George W. Bush i kamap long Singapore long moning bilong Novemba 16, long statim wanpela wik we em bai i raun lukim Asia.
English: Muhammad was deeply interested in matters beyond this mundane life. He used to frequent a cave that became known as “Hira‘” on the Mountain of “Noor” (light) for contemplation.
Tok Pisin: Muhammad i gat intres long ol samting we i bikpela moa long ol samting bilong dispela laip. Em i save go long wanpela hul bilong ston we ol i kolim olsem “Hira'” long Mountain of “Noor” (lait) long i stap na tingting.

predictions: Giza Plateau, o "Giza Necropolis" long Valley bilong Dead long Ijipt i gat olgeta wanpela pyramide (olsem wanpela i bikpela pinis), olgeta liklik tom, olgeta tempel, na gat wanpela bikpela Sphinx.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
Tok Pisin: Maski em i lusim dispela 'show' long 1993 em i holim yet dispela taitel bilong 'executive producer', em i kontinu (continue) long kisim ten milien dola long olgeta sisen (season) olsem 'royalty' mani.

Tok Pisin: Ol i ken lukluk gut tru long tudak wantaim 'night vision', na tu, ol i save muv isi tru. Ol 'ocelot' i save painim kaikai bilong ol taim ol i hait wantaim ol samting i stap long envairomen na kalap antap long animal we ol i laik ketsim.
English: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan tok ples bilong Barcelona em Catalan na Spanish. Klostu hap namba bilong ol lain i stap long hap i save tok ples Catalan, bikpela namba moa i save long em, na klostu olgeta lain i save long Spanish.

Tok Pisin: Ol manmeri bai bringim ol samting bilong mekim ofa i go long ol god na ol pris bai traim long inapim samting we ol god i nidim taim ol i mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) na ol bikpela bung bilong lotu.

Tok Pisin: Three Kingdoms em i wanpela bilong ol taim bilong pait insait long histori bilong Ancient China we planti tausen manmeri i dai taim ol pait long sindaun long nambawan sia insait long 'grand palace' long Xi’an.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
Tok Pisin: Deputy Prime Minister bilong Singapore Wong Kan Seng i tok halo long em na em i toktok wantaim Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong long 'trade' na 'terrorism'.

Tok Pisin: Em i kamap wantaim dispela laspela tingting bikos long planti gutpela toktok na 'encouragment' we ol meri na man i salim i go long em na i tokim em olsem marasin bilong spesim pikinini em i mas kamap olsem wanpela sevis we olgeta haus sik i mas givim.
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.

English: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
Tok Pisin: Ol plen bilong givim ol dispela sut marasin i go long ol eria we i gat histori bilong planti lain pik i sik long dispela yia i no bin kamap bikos i no gat inap mani na ol i no ting olsem em i wanpela bikpela samting taim ol i skelim em wantaim ol narapela sik.
English: The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, ol Arab i bin kisim Islam i kam long ol dispela hap, na ol i kamap olsem bikpela lotu insait long Comoros na Mayotte.

Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol lain i save stap long Bishkek i sutim tok long ol lain i mekim protes (protest) long saut olsem ol i kamapim dispela pasin bilong brukim lo.

Tok Pisin: Ol meri: Em i gutpela olsem ol meri i we i go long hap i mas tok olsem ol i marit, maski ol i no marit tru tru.
English: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.
Tok Pisin: Dispela man we i bin winim gol medel (gold medal) i bai swim insait long 100m na 200m 'freestyle' na insait long tripela 'relay' long Commonwealth Games, tasol bikos long ol komplen bilong em long 'fitness' em i ol i no save sapos em bai pilai.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Ol 'winter sport' em planti lain long ol 'Northern regions' i save long en, na ol lain long Italy i save pilai insait long ol intanesinel geim (game) na ol Olympic events.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'handicraft' em ol i kolim ol olsem ol 'antique', maski ol i no gat bikpela krismas wankain olsem ol narapela samting we fektori (factory) i mekim planti long wanpela taim.

Tok Pisin: Oyapock River Bridge em i wanpelad 'cable-stayed bridge'. Em i stap long Oyapock River na konektim ol siti bilong Oiapoque insait long Brazil na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock insait long French Guiana.

Tok Pisin: I gat tredisen (tradition) i bilong no ken slip long Easter nait na stap long wanpela ples klia long lukim san i kirap.

Tok Pisin: Bihain long olgeta samting, em i wok bilong lida long mekim tim i mekim gut wok o i no mekim gut wok.

Tok Pisin: Izmir em i namba tri bikpela siti insait long Turkey wantaim wanpela populesen long kain olsem 3.7 milien, namba tu bikpela port bihainim long Istanbul, na em i wanpela bikpela senta bilong trenspot (transport).
English: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
Tok Pisin: Em i givim yumi trein (train), kar, ma planti narapela masin bilong 'transportation'.

Tok Pisin: Tasol, bikos pasin bilong salim toktok i go i kam i save kisim taim, ol stail bilong wes bai stap bihain long 25 i go long 30-pela yia.
English: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela sko (score) em i wanpela poin win, 21 na 20, na i pinisim 15-pela geim (game ) we All Blacks i bin winim.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela long tim bilong em Fernando Alonso i stap long fran olgeta taim insait long resis, tasol em i stop long resis taim em i mekim wanpela 'pit stop', i luk olsem dispela i kamap biko long wanpela fran wil (wheel) we ol i no putim gut.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
Tok Pisin: Displela nupela envairomen i gat ol kainkain risos na ol kainkain kompetisen, olsem na dispela nupela populesen (population) bai nidim ol narapela pasin long kamap strong moa long mak we ol i bin stap long en bipo.
English: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i save kolim dispela proses (process) 'speciation', dispela em i min olsem kamapim nupela 'specie'. 'Speciation' em i wanpela samting we yumi i no inap long abrusim na em i wanpela impoten pat bilong 'evolution'.
English: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan samting we i soim olsem 'internal poisoning' i kamap em wanpela kontena bilong marasin o 'toxic chemical' bilong haus i op na i stap.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.

predictions: Olgeta taim long yia, ol i go long rif na ol i no bin kamap olgeta taim, na ol i lukautim olgeta long rif na ol i no bin kamap olgeta taim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu bin i go long narapela kantri long namba wan taim tru, yu bin isi na traim long lainim samting, yu save olsem ol travela i stap long narapela kantri i mas senisim tingting na pasin bilong ol.
English: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
Tok Pisin: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger i sainim wanpela 'bill' na mekim em i kamap olsem lo tru tru we i stopim ol lain long salim o rentim o geim (game) bilong pait i go long ol pikinini.
English: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, yu mas sekim olsem yu kolim 'r' na 'rr' narakain: 'caro' em i min olsem dia, na 'carro' em i min olsem 'chariot'.
English: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
Tok Pisin: Ol ofisa bilong Armsterdam siti na Anne Frank Museum i tok olsem dispela diwai em wanpela 'fungus' i bagarapim em na em i ken kamapim bagarap long helt bilong pablik taim ol i tok olsem em i laik pundaun.
English: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i no save bilong wanem na ol mobail fon sevis i strong moa long hia na i no strong long planti ol narapela hap bilong dispela rot, kain olsem Pennsylvania Wilds.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Tasol, kisim tok save bilong ol atoriti, bihainim olgeta sain, na ritim na bihainim gut ol tok lukaut.
predictions: Tasol, lukim kaunsil bilong ol ofisial, stap gut long ol sindaun, na givim bikpela atensan long tok bilong sikuriti.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol pasin we ol lain i save mekim long dispela holide em ol lain i no Kristen na ol kantri we i no Kristen kantri i save bihainim long olgeta hap bilong graun.
English: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
Tok Pisin: Straksa bilong ol dispela gras bilong pisin i soim olsem wok bilong ol em i no bilong flai tasol em i bilong mekim tempritsa (temperature) bilong bodi bilong ol i stap gut na bilong soim kala bilong ol long ol narapela. Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
Tok Pisin: U.S President George W. Bush i kamap long Singapore long moning bilong Novemba 16, long statim wanpela wik we em bai i raun lukim Asia.
English: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.
Tok Pisin: Dispela man we i bin winim gol medel (gold medal) i bai swim insait long 100m na 200m 'freestyle' na insait long tripela 'relay' long Commonwealth Games, tasol bikos long ol komplen bilong em long 'fitness' em i ol i no save sapos em bai pilai.
English: Virtual teams are held to the same standards of excellence as conventional teams, but there are subtle differences.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i ken i gat ol wankain stendet bilong mekim gut wok wankain olsem ol tim we i save wok wantaim long ofis, tasol i gat sampela liklik samting i narakain.

English: Box jellyfish occur near beaches and near river estuaries from October to April north of 1770. They can occasionally be found outside these times.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'box jellyfish' i save kamap olgeta taim arere long nambis na arere long ol maus wara long Oktoba i go long Epril long hap nat long 1770. Sampela taim ol i ken kamap autsait long ol dispela taim.
predictions: Box jellyfish i kamap nabaut long bikpela hap bilong solwara na nabaut long hap bilong river long taim bilong October go pinis long taim bilong April long nambis bilong 1770. Ol i save kamap tu long taim narapela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.

English: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
Tok Pisin: Ol weda (weather) nogut bilong wanwan rijen o sisen em ol 'blizzard', 'snowstorm', 'ice storm', na 'dust storm'.

Tok Pisin: Murray i lusim namba wan 'set' bilong em insait long wanpela 'tie breal' taim tupela man wantaim i kisim olgeta 'serve' insait long dispela 'set'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'paleontologists' tude i bilip olsem wanpela grup bilong ol dainaso i stap laip yet long tude. Mipela i save kolim ol olsem pisin.
English: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'mutation' we i kamap insait long ol 'germ-line cell' tasol em ol i ken i go long ol pikinini, tasol ol 'mutation' we i kamap long narapela hap i ken kamapim 'cell-death' o kensa.
English: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.
Tok Pisin: Na moa yet, sapos ol i no inap long mekim dispela ol bikpela samting i ken kamap: 'growth depression', 'malnutrition', na bikpela tru em i dai.
English: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
Tok Pisin: Duvall, em i marit na em i gat tupela bikpela pikinini, na em i no mekim Miller i amamas, we dispela stori i toktok long en.
English: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela we tasol bilong salim samting hariap em long salim em olsem wanpela 'checked luggage', Ol lo bilong 'airline' bai i no inap long ol bek we i no gat pasindia, na dispela hap em yu bai helpim.

predictions: Saltwater Crocodile i no stap long solwara, ples bilong ol em i stap long hap bilong river long nambis bilong Rockhampton.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: “'Personal involvement'” na “'continuing relationship'” em Eighmey and McCord (1998) i bin luksave olsem ol nupela samting we i kirapim bel bilong yumi long yusim intanet taim ol i mekim stadi long pasin bilong ol manmeri long ol websait.
English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'shooter' insait long dispela 'supplementary pest control' test em ol 'ranger' i was long ol, bikos dispela test em ol i monitarim (monitor) na skelim 'effectiveness' bilong em.
English: Due to the cluster/group of islands Japan has, Japan is often referred to, on a geographical stance, as an "archipelago"
Tok Pisin: Bikos long grup bilong ol ailan we Japan i gat, ol laini save kolim Japan olsem, long sait bilong 'geography', em i wanpela "'archipelago'"
English: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.
Tok Pisin: Neurobiological infomesen i givim evidens (evidence) long wanpela 'theoretical approach' long investigesen bilong 'cognition'. Olsem na em i mekim eria bilong risets i kamap liklik moa na mekim em i kamap long 'exact'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: At the other end of the spectrum, one morphs into an unrecognizable individual that feels he or she must change everything the team has been doing and make it their own.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait, wanpela meneja i senis i go na kamap olsem wanpela man o meri we ol lain i bo save long em na em i pilim olsem em i mas senisim olgeta samting we tim i wok long mekim na mekim olgeta samting long strong bilong ol yet.
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.
English: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
Tok Pisin: 'Pronunciation' em i tok ples Italian bikos planti bilong ol wod em ol i save kolim olsem hau ol i raitim.

Tok Pisin: 'Boating' o pasin bilong raun long bot em i wanpela samting we olgeta manmeri long Finland i save laik long mekim. Ol i gat planti bot, wanpela bot em i inap long 7-pela o 8-pela manmeri.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain Egypt i bildim long 'third century' BCE, Great Pyramid em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela pyramid straksa we ol i wokim long givim ona long wanpela Pharaoh we i dai pinis.

Tok Pisin: Antap bilong Moon em i gat ol ston na das (dust). 'Outer layer' bilong Moon em ol i kolim 'crust'.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.

English: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.

Tok Pisin: Aristotle, wanpela filosofa (philosopher), i kamapim tingting olsem olgeta samting i kamap long ol wanpela o moa bilong ol foapela elemen (elements) i miks wantaim. Ol dispela elemen em graun, wara, win, na paia.
English: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i laspela geim (game) bilong ol All Blacks, husat i bin winim pinis dispela 'trophy' long tupela wik i go pinis.

English: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.

English: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.

Tok Pisin: Long 'twelfth century', velu (value) bilong em i go daun bikos ol Crusaders i bin kam bek na ol i karim ol presen kain olsem ol silk na spais. Velu bilong ol dispela samting i antap moa long velu bilong ol samting we i stap long ol maket bilong ol Byzantine.

Tok Pisin: Ol i stap kol moa long ol ples we i raunim ol long san na long nait ol i hot moa long ol ples we i raunim ol.

English: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

Tok Pisin: 'National football' bilong Italy, wantaim 'national football' tim bilong Germany em tupela namba tu tim we i gutpela tru insait long olgeta hap bilong graun na ol i bin sempion bilong FIFA World Cup long 2006.
English: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

Tok Pisin: taim i go long pinis bilong ol Middle Ages 'western' Europe i stat long kamapim ol stail bilong ol yet. Wanpela bilong ol bikpela divelopmen we i kamap long dispela taim bikos long ol 'crusades' em ol manmeri i stat long yusim ol baten long pasim ol klos.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, bihain long Revolution ol wok i op long olgeta man long larim ol man i gat driman na i save wok hat long mekim ol gutpela wok we ol i laik long mekim.
English: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
Tok Pisin: 'Spinx' em i stap long baksait na em i stap olsem man i wok long autim stori.
English: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday.
Tok Pisin: Sampela lain i bin yusim ol kainkain 'hardware' na 'software' long stat nilong Febueri long sekim sapos dispela em i stret na ol i tokaut long dispela long Tunde.
English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
Tok Pisin: Em i no i stap em yet, 'experimentation', na wanpela 'experiment' em i wanpela 'test' ol save yusim long rausim wanpela o moa bilong ol tingting we ol i bin kamapim, pasin bilong askim ol kwesten, na mekim stadi tu i save givim stia long 'scientific research'.

predictions: İzmir em i wanpela long ol bikpela siti long Turkey wantaim populasen bilong 3.7 million, em i namba tu long ol bikpela ples bilong olgeta hap bilong Istanbul, na em i wanpela gutpela ples bilong transport.

English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

English: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
Tok Pisin: Germany em i stap olsem birua bilong planti lain long World War 2, dispela i mekim na wok bung i kamap namel long USSR na USA. Taim woa i pinis, bam i kamap namel long ol sistem, ol proses (process) na kalsa na dispela i mekim ol kantri i no wok wantaim.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.
English: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'foster care' i sapos long givim olgeta samting we ol i no bin gat long haus we ol i kisim ol long en.

Tok Pisin: Em i klostu long hat olgeta long senisim karensi (currency) bilong Falkland autsait long ol ailan, olsem na yu mas senisim mani bipo long yu lusim dispela ailan.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
Tok Pisin: Europe em i wanpela kontinen (continent) we i liklik, tasol em i gat planti indipenden kantri. Planti taim, long raun i go long planti kantri em bai min olsem yu bai go insait long planti 'visa application' na 'passport control' moa long wanpela taim.
English: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol 'research telescope' em ol i bikpela fesiliti (facilty) we i stap long ol longwe ples long ol gutpela 'atmospheric condition'.
English: They often have more autonomy than conventional team members as their teams may meet according to varying time zones which may not be understood by their local management.
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim samting long laik bilong ol moa long ol tim we i save wok insait long ofis taim ol bung wantaim ol narapela tim memba long taim we i gutpela long ol kainkain 'time zone' na dispela em ol lokel meneja i no inap long klia long en.
English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri em ol i kam long wanpela famili, kain olsem wanpela bikpela famili bilong ol sista na ol pikinini meri bilong ol.
English: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
Tok Pisin: Ol stretim bek gen ol 'economic link' namel long dispela tupela hap bilong Moldova maski ol toktok bilong politiks i no kamap gut.

English: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.
Tok Pisin: Maski ol 'wagonways' em ol plang we i stap sait sait long rot, ol i mekim ol hos we i pulim ol long spit moa na i pulim bikpela kago long ol rot we i no raf (rough) moa long mak bilong ol rot we i save stap long dispela de.

English: Machu Picchu consist of three main structures, namely Intihuatana, the Temple of the Sun, and the Room of the Three Windows.
